game.name: Chocolate Fudge Cupcakes
game.description:
Hey girls! A new week has just begun and you all need to try out some exciting and tasty recipe. Chocolate Fudge Cupcakes is an awesome free online cooking game which brings you a brand new dessert recipe. Hope this will work better when it comes to making your hectic days a little bit sweeter and brighter. Get participated in this wonderful kitchen game to learn how to prepare a really mouth-watering dessert recipe. Share it with your friends and family at your home!

It is very easy and simple to make this exclusive yet fantastic dessert treat. Start it with just collecting a few necessary ingredients. You do not have to put extra efforts in its preparation. All you need to do is just follow all the available guidelines and you will see the completion of your goal shortly. As you know that chocolate fudge is just like a sweet guilty pleasure that everyone wants to take after a proper lunch or dinner. And it is also a pride moment to share it with your friends when they visit at your home. 

Start this cool game with pouring some chocolate, brown sugar, butter and water in a pan that you have to put on the stove first. Mix chocolate mixture, flour, eggs and vanilla essence in another bowl. Take a tray and put some pretty muffin cups into it. Complete their filling with the help of your sweet chocolate batter. Place them into the oven to bake until they get a nice brown color. Then prepare your favorite chocolate fudge. Use cherries, candy and colourful sprinkles to decorate your cupcakes. Play it in your browser and enjoy the best cooing game for girls!
